description.config.wover.main.log.verbos: Writes additional info into the log file. Usefull for debugging issues
description.config.wover.main.server.for: When you create a new world on a server, the BetterX World Type will be selected by default. This can be changed in teh server-properties file.
Sometimes we present download links to updates. If you prefer those to link to Modrinth instead of CurseForge, you can enable this option.
title.config.wover.main.server.force_def: BetterX World Type as default for new server worlds
wover.mainmenu.title: WorldWeaver Configuration
